external_games.name: Aprende con Horacio: La Gran Aventura de las Palabras

name: Aprende con Horacio: La Gran Aventura de las Palabras
summary: "La gran aventura de las palabras" (The Great Adventure of Words), also known as "Aprende con Horacio" (Learn with Horacio), is an educational game by the Anaya publishing house where you play with the great Horacio, Rodolfato, and Alfabeto, crossing their entire labyrinth house full of puzzles, reading challenges, and all sorts of language-related games.
